subtask.title: Define and categorize AI agents
subtask.objective: Identify and describe different types of AI agents (e.g., autonomous agents, conversational agents) and their core characteristics.
subtask.scope: Overview of AI agent types, their architectures, and functional distinctions.

verification.completion_summary: The research findings successfully identified and described various types of AI agents, their core characteristics, architectures, and functional distinctions, focusing on enterprise, autonomous, and coding agents. The findings cover the scope of AI agent types, their operational paradigms, and strategic considerations, aligning with the original objectives.

covered_aspects: Identification of different AI agent types (e.g., web, enterprise, coding)
Descriptions of core characteristics and functionalities
Discussion of architectures and operational paradigms
missing_aspects: Explicit categorization schemes or taxonomy of AI agents
Detailed architectural frameworks for each type
Clear distinctions between different classes beyond examples

missing_requirements: Explicit definitions and classifications for each AI agent type
Explicit differentiation of agent categories and their core traits
